atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities`, and `screens` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: allows you to define your project's custom design tokens directly within your global CSS file, replacing the theme section in tailwind.config.js for certain customizations.

atDirectives.name: @reference
atDirectives.description: allows import of tailwind v4 or custom css definitions without actually importing the styles.

atDirectives.name: @utility
atDirectives.description: allows addition of tailwind v4 utility classes.

atDirectives.name: @plugin
atDirectives.description: allows addition of tailwind v4 plugins.
